Class Polygon

java.lang.Object
  Polygon

public class Polygon
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an one dimesional array of vertices of polygon(max 10)

adds vertice to the polygon in the first possible place

Returns:

finds the place of the point in the array

Parameters:

Returns:

getBoundingBox

public Polygon getBoundingBox()
returns the rectangle as polygon that is parralel to x and y and blocks the current polygon

Returns:
the rectangle that blocks the polygon as polygon. if the polygon has less then 3 vertices it returns null.

getNextVertex

public Point1 getNextVertex(Point1 p)
gets a point as parameter and return the next point in the array

Parameters:
p - the point that the method gets
Returns:
the next point and null if p isnt in the array.

highestVertex

public Point1 highestVertex()
returns the vertice with the highest y

Returns:

isBigger

checks if the polygon is bigger in area then the parameter polygon.

Parameters:
other - the other polygon
Returns:
true if the current polygon is bigger in the area then the param polygon
